ZIP_FTELL(3) Library Functions Manual ZIP_FTELL(3)

NAME

zip_ftell — tell position in file

LIBRARY

libzip (-lzip)

SYNOPSIS

#include <zip.h>

zip_int64_t
zip_ftell(zip_file_t *file);

DESCRIPTION

The zip_ftell() function reports the current offset in the file.

RETURN VALUES

If successful, zip_ftell returns the current file position. Otherwise, -1 is returned.

SEE ALSO

libzip(3), zip_fclose(3), zip_file_get_error(3), zip_fopen(3), zip_fread(3), zip_fseek(3)

HISTORY

zip_ftell() was added in libzip 1.2.0.

AUTHORS

Dieter Baron <dillo@nih.at> and Thomas Klausner <wiz@gatalith.at>
